title: Sage's Kelly: 'Digital Heartbeat' of Small Businesses (Audio)
itunes:title: Sage's Kelly: 'Digital Heartbeat' of Small Businesses (Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Taking Stock with Kathleen Hays and Pimm Fox. GUEST: Stephen Kelly, CEO of Sage, on this year's Sage Summit, tech companies in the US vs the UK, and transitioning small businesses to the cloud.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
